description:
Don’t let weather or lack of firewood get in the way of enjoying the warmth of a campfire. This travel-sized firepit is great for camping, beach parties or picnics. Hook it up to a 20lb propane tank and have a fire without smoke, sparks or ash.

  • Steel body with protective enamel finish
  • Stainless steel burner has output of 58,000 BTU/hr
  • Adjustable flame height
  • Auto-ignition need no matches or lighters
  • Natural lava rock flickers similar to a wood fire
  • CSA approved for use during campfire bans (check local restrictions)
  • Includes cover, carry kit, 3m hose with regulator and propane tank stabilizer ring
name: Outland Living Premium Fire Pit
